channel.title: Game of the Decade
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vcta-LTXXh0']Game of the Decade[/url] What was your favourite game of the past decade, the naughties or the nowts, whatever you perfer, mine would pretty much be the same as the above for all the above reasons, Half Life 2, what was yours?
I've decided to keep a tally and added more categories to make it a little more intresting, feel free to include your reasons why as well
1 - What was your favourite FPS over the past decade?
Half Life 2 - IIIII 1/3 Quake 4 - 1/3 COD4 Modern Warfare - 1/3
2 - What was your favourite Racer over the past decade?
Burnout Revenge - I Dirt - I Grid - II Need For Speed Shift - I rFactor - I Wipeout Pure - I
3 - What was your favourite RPG over the past decade?
The Witcher - I Mass Effect - I Fallout 3 - I Final Fantasy IX - I Torchlight - I
4 - What was your favourite Platformer over the past decade?
Super Mario Galaxy - IIII Doukutsu Monogatari (Cave Story) - I Braid - I
5 - What was your favourite Beat'em Up over the past decade?
Power Stone 2 - I Street Fighter 4 - I
6 - What was your favourite Action/Adventure over the past decade?
Resident Evil 4 - II Uncharted: Drake's Fortune - II Mirrors Edge - I Metroid Prime - 1/2 Zelda - The Windwaker - 1/2 Assassin's Creed - I
7 - What was your favourite RTS/Strategy game over the past decade?
C&C Tiberian Wars - I Age Of Mythology - I
8 - What was your favourite Casual game (Includes Xbox Live Arcade, Wii VC) over the past decade?
Peggle - II Braid - I
9 - What was your favourite gaming platform over the past decade?
Gamecube - I Wii - I 1/3 PS2 - I Xbox360 - 1/3 PC - II 1/3
10 - What was your overall favourite game over the past decade?
Half Life 2 - IIIII IIIII IIIII II F.E.A.R - I 1/2 Warcraft 3 - I Bioshock - I Portal - I God Hand - 1/2 Counter Strike Source - I Halo CE - I Grand Theft Auto 3 - I Peggle - I

item.title: Game of the Decade
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
Codgin:

1 - What was your favourite FPS over the past decade?
2 - What was your favourite Racer over the past decade?
3 - What was your favourite RPG over the past decade?
4 - What was your favourite Platformer over the past decade?
5 - What was your favourite Beat’em Up over the past decade?
6 - What was your favourite Action/Adventure over the past decade?
7 - What was your favourite RTS/Strategy game over the past decade?
8 - What was your favourite Casual game (Includes Xbox Live Arcade, Wii VC) over the past decade?
9 - What was your favourite gaming platform over the past decade?
10 - What was your overall favourite game over the past decade?

1 - Half-Life 2
2 - rFactor
3 - Torchlight(hurr)
4 - Braid?
5 - erm…
6 - Assassin’s Creed
7 - Age of Mythology(hurr)
8 - Braid?
9 - It would have to be the Personal Computer, it has always been there for me. But GameCube I had the most fun on until recently…
10 - I’d say HL2 but that would be sooooo typical of a HL2 mod forum… Half-Life 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Game of the Decade
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
Codgin:
  1. What was your favourite FPS over the past decade?
  2. What was your favourite Racer over the past decade?
  3. What was your favourite RPG over the past decade?
  4. What was your favourite Platformer over the past decade?
  5. What was your favourite Beat’em Up over the past decade?
  6. What was your favourite Action/Adventure over the past decade?
  7. Your favourite console over the past decade?
  8. What was your overall favourite game over the past decade?
  1. Half-Life 2
  2. I guess Wipeout Pure since it’s the only one I own.
  3. Final Fantasy IX
  4. Doukutsu Monogatari (Cave Story. A free game, download it RIGHT NOW if you haven’t played it before. It’s quality is unseen for a one man project)
  5. meh
  6. Zelda: The Windwaker. Or Metroid Prime. Dunno.
  7. PC. But if you really want a console, the Playstation 2.
  8. Half-Life 2

Read full topic

item.title: Game of the Decade
item.dc:creator: Codgin
item.description:
Soviet:

I hardly think genres like Platformer deserve a category, considering how few of them even exist. Plus, where is strategy? Furthermore, favorite console isn’t really a fair question, gaming platform would be better.

OK added a few more questions and modifed the “console” question to hopefully make it even more intresting then it was the last time… lol As for platformers theres been a fair few, be it some are unheard of most the time, take for example, Banjo Tooie, Sonic Rush, Banjo Kazooie - Nuts & Bolts, Braid, Super Mario Galaxy, Super Mario Sunshine, New Super Mario Brothers, Donkey Kong Jungle Beat, Crash The Wraith Of Cortex, Crash Twinsainty

Oh I also took your vote for your best platformer and put it in the adventure genre, hope you don’t mind, I thought Mirrors Edge more adventure/action

1 - What was your favourite FPS over the past decade?
2 - What was your favourite Racer over the past decade?
3 - What was your favourite RPG over the past decade?
4 - What was your favourite Platformer over the past decade?
5 - What was your favourite Beat’em Up over the past decade?
6 - What was your favourite Action/Adventure over the past decade?
7 - What was your favourite RTS/Strategy game over the past decade?
8 - What was your favourite Casual game (Includes Xbox Live Arcade, Wii VC) over the past decade?
9 - What was your favourite gaming platform over the past decade?
10 - What was your overall favourite game over the past decade?

(Feel free to include your reasons)

If you have any questions you think I should add, include them at the bottom of your lists, and I’ll see if I approve

Read full topic

item.title: Game of the Decade
item.dc:creator: Codgin
item.description:
Alcator:

I can, to some extent, understand polls like “What is the best FPS of last 5 years” But asking people to chose the best game (from over a dozen different genres) is immature.

Well not really at movie awards for example you always have an award for best motion picture, could litteratly be any genre, its just down to personal taste
If it makes the topic a little more intresting for you and everyone else

  1. What was your favourite FPS over the past decade?

  2. What was your favourite Racer over the past decade?

  3. What was your favourite RPG over the past decade?

  4. What was your favourite Platformer over the past decade?

  5. What was your favourite Beat’em Up over the past decade?

  6. What was your favourite Action/Adventure over the past decade?

  7. Your favourite console over the past decade?

  8. What was your overall favourite game over the past decade?

  9. Half Life 2

  10. Burnout Revenge

  11. Shockingly I havent played an RPG since FF9 on the psx, so my vote would be inaccurate

  12. Super Mario Galaxy

  13. Not a big fan of the genre

  14. Resident Evil 4

  15. Wii

  16. Half Life 2

Read full topic

item.title: Game of the Decade
item.dc:creator: Alcator
item.description:
Choosing between Dragon Age Origins and Half-Life 2 and WarCraft 3 and Braid is like choosing between Sex, Friends, Cars, Money and Movies. In the end, if you are only getting one of those, you become sick of it. The right mix of all those (and more) is needed for greatest enjoyment.

I can, to some extent, understand polls like “What is the best FPS of last 5 years” But asking people to chose the best game (from over a dozen different genres) is immature.

Read full topic

item.title: Game of the Decade
item.dc:creator: Codgin
item.description:
Acristoff:

You now realize that the decade doesn’t end until 2011.

theres much debate over this but to me we’ve gone from 0 to 1, that says to me new decade, same as it was when we hit the millenium, the nintenies, eighties, seventies etc. Would you call 1970 the sixties?
